steps.processorData:
select
    e/ehr_id/value as ehr_id,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value as mrn,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/namespace as authority,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0005]/value/value as Text,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0006]/value/value as Description,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0007]/value/value as CodedValue,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0007]/value/defining_code/code_string as Code,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0008]/value/value as ValidFrom,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0009]/value/value as ValidTo,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0010]/value/value as RecordedBy,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0011]/value/value as RemovedBy,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0012]/value/value as IsActive
from EHR e
contains COMPOSITION a
contains EVALUATION a_a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.patient_flag.v0]
where mrn = :mrn
